Hedonite Go4 (Age of Sigmar) [970pts]

  • **Narrative and Open Play** (Chaos - Slaanesh) [970pts]

    • Leader [360pts]

      • Shardspeaker of Slaanesh [150pts]

        Selections: 2. Girdle of the Realm-racer, 3. Dark Delusions, Arcane Bolt, Haze Staff, Mystic Shield, Shadow-cloaked Claws

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAANESH, HEDONITE, HERO, Leader, WIZARD, SHARDSPEAKER, 9 or less wounds Leader, Artefact

        Artefact: Girdle of the Realm-racer, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Dark Delusions, Mystic Shield, Reflection Eternal, Unit: Shardspeaker of Slaanesh, Unit Abilities: Fly, Mist Lurkers, Twisted Mirror, Weapon: Haze Staff, Shadow-cloaked Claws


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Girdle of the Realm-racer Subtract 1 from the bearer's Wounds characteristic. In addition, the bearer can fly.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Dark Delusions 4Pick 1 enemy unit wholly within 18" of the caster that is visible to them, and roll 2D6. If the roll is equal to or greater than that unit's Bravery characteristic, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Reflection Eternal 6If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made by that unit in the following combat phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Shardspeaker of Slaanesh 6"575+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Mist Lurkers If this unit successfully casts a spell that is not unbound, until your next hero phase, you can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit and it can attack using the Shadow-cloaked Claws melee weapon when it fights.
        Twisted Mirror Once per turn in your shooting phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 9" of this model and roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to wound rolls for attacks that target that unit in the following combat phase. The same unit cannot be affected by this ability more than once per turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Haze Staff Melee1"24+3+-D3
        Shadow-cloaked Claws Melee2"43+3+-21

      • Syll'esske the Vengeful Allegiance [210pts]

        Selections: 1. Lash of Slaanesh, Axe of Dominion, General, Scourging Whip

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, HERALD OF SLAANESH, HERO, SLAANESH, HEDONITE, WIZARD, Unique, Leader, Behemoth, 9 or less wounds Leader, General, Unique General

        Command Abilities: Regal Authority, Magic: Magic, Spell: Lash of Slaanesh, Subvert, Unit: Syll'esske the Vengeful Allegiance, Unit Abilities: Deadly Symbiosis, Lithe and Swift, The Vengeful Allegiance, Weapon: Axe of Dominion, Scourging Whip


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Regal Authority You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase if this model is your general and is on the battlefield. If you do so, until the end of that phase, do not take battleshock tests for friendly SLAANESH units while they are wholly within 18" of this model.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Magic 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Subvert
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Lash of Slaanesh 5Pick 1 point on the battlefield within 12" of the caster that is visible to them, and draw an imaginary straight line 1mm wide between that point and the closest part of the caster's base. Roll a dice for each enemy model passed across by this line. On a 4+ that model's unit suffers 1 mortal wound. SLAANESH units are unaffected by this spell.
        Subvert 7You can pick 1 enemy HERO within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Until your next hero phase, that HERO cannot issue or receive commands.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Syll'esske the Vengeful Allegiance 8"9104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Deadly Symbiosis You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly HEDONITE units wholly within 18" of this model if the number of friendly MORTAL HEDONITE units wholly within 18" of this model is equal to the number of other friendly DAEMON HEDONITE units wholly within 18" of this model.
        Lithe and Swift This unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        The Vengeful Allegiance In the combat phase, if the unmodified hit roll for any attack made with a melee weapon that targets this model is 1, add 1 to hit and wound rolls for attacks made by this model that target the attacking unit in the same phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Axe of Dominion Melee2"44+3+-2D3
        Scourging Whip Melee2"83+4+-11

    • Battleline [320pts]

      • Blissbarb Archers [180pts]

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAANESH, HEDONITE, Battleline

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Blissbarb Archers 6"166+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Blissbrew Homonculus 1 in every 11 models in this unit must be a Blissbrew Homonculus. A Blissbrew Homonculus is armed with a Sybarite Blade. Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with missile weapons by this unit while it includes any Blissbrew Homonculi.
        High Tempter 1 model in this unit can be a High Tempter. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Blissbarb Bow.
        Light-footed Killers This unit can run and still shoot later in the same turn.

      • Daemonettes [140pts]

        Selections: 10 Daemonettes [140pts], Banner Bearer(s), Hornblower(s), Piercing Claws

        Unit: Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Unit Abilities: Alluress, Banner Bearers, Hornblower, Icon and Standard Bearers, Lithe and Swift, Weapon: Piercing Claws


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Daemonettes of Slaanesh 6"1105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Alluress The leader of this unit is the Alluress. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of an Alluress' Piercing Claws.
        Banner Bearers You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Daemonette Banner Bearers.
        Hornblower 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 6" of this unit while this unit includes any Daemonette Hornblowers is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.
        Icon and Standard Bearers 1 in every 5 models in this unit can either be a Daemonette Banner Bearer or Daemonette Icon Bearer.
        Lithe and Swift This unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.

    • Other [290pts]

      • Seekers [140pts]

        Selections: 5 Seekers [140pts], Heartseeker, Hornblower, Piercing Claws, Poisoned Tongue, Seeker Icon Bearer

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, SEEKERS, SLAANESH, Other

        Unit: Seekers, Unit Abilities: Heartseeker, Hornblower, Icon and Standard Bearers, Quicksilver Speed, Seeker Icon Bearer, Soul Hunters, Weapon: Piercing Claws, Poisoned Tongue


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Seekers 14"2105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Heartseeker 1 model in this unit can be a Heartseeker. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of a Heartseeker’s Piercing Claws.
        Hornblower 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Seeker Hornblower. If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 6" of this unit while this unit includes any Seeker Hornblowers is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.
        Icon and Standard Bearers 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Seeker Banner Bearer, and 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Seeker Icon Bearer.
        Quicksilver Speed You can roll 2D6 instead of D6 when you make a run roll for this unit. In addition, this unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.
        Seeker Icon Bearer If an unmodified battleshock roll of 1 is made for this unit while it includes any Seeker Icon Bearers, you can add D3 models to this unit, and no models from this unit will flee in that phase.
        Soul Hunters If any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this unit’s attacks in the combat phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons in the next combat phase.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Piercing Claws Melee1"24+4+-11
        Poisoned Tongue Melee1"23+4+-1

      • Slaangor Fiendbloods [150pts]

        Selections: 3 Slaangor Fiendbloods [150pts], Razor-sharp Claw(s), Slake-Horn

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Slaangor Fiendbloods 8"365+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Obsessive Violence At the end of the combat phase, pick 1 enemy unit within 3" of this unit and roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Slake-Horn 1 model in this unit can be a Slake-Horn. That model is armed with a Razorsharp Claw and Gilded Weapon.
        Slaughter At Any Cost Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons if it made a charge move in the same turn.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Slaanesh

          Selections: Godseekers Host

          Categories: Coalition: Beasts of Chaos, Coalition: Slaves to Darkness

          Battalion Organisation: Godseekers Hedonite Host, Battle Trait: Euphoric Killers, Feast of Depravities, Locus of Diversion, Maniacal Hunters, Thundering Cavalcade, Total Acquiescence, Depravity Point Table: (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets, (02) 30 Daemonettes, (03) 3 Seeker Chariots, (04) 20 Daemonettes, (05) 1 Contorted Epitome, (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot, (07) 3 Fiends, (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer, (09) 1 Exalted Chariot, (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh, (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot, (12) 1 Hellflayer, (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh, (14) 1 Seeker Chariot, (15) 5 Seekers, (16) 10 Daemonettes


        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Godseekers Hedonite Host Hedonite Hosts in your army must have 0-2 Epicurean Revellers battalions instead of 1-3, and 2-4 Seeker Cavalcade battalions instead of 1-3.
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Euphoric Killers If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a HEDONITE model is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. If the attacking model’s unit has 20 or more models, its attacks inflict 3 hits on an unmodified hit roll of 6 instead.
        Feast of Depravities You can summon SLAANESH DAEMON units to the battlefield if you collect enough depravity points (DPs). At the end of the battleshock phase, you receive 1 depravity point for each unit on the battlefield that had a wound or mortal wound that was not negated allocated to it in that turn, or has fewer models than it had at the start of that turn.

        If you have any depravity points at th end of your movement phase, you can summon 1 unit from the list below to the battlefield and add it to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of depravity points as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough depravity points to do so. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly SLAANESH HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Locus of Diversion At the end of the charge phase, each friendly HEDONITE DAEMON HERO that is within 1" of an enemy unit can create a locus of diversion. If they do so, pick 1 enemy unit that is within 1" of that HERO and roll a dice, adding 1 if that HERO is a GREATER DAEMON. On a 4+, that unit cannot make a pile-in move before it attacks in the same combat phase. You cannot pick the same unit as the target for this ability more than once in the same phase (whether the roll is successful or not).
        Maniacal Hunters At the end of your charge phase, you receive D3 depravity points if your general made a charge move in the same turn. Add 1 to the roll if any other friendly GODSEEKERS units made a charge move in that turn.
        Thundering Cavalcade Add 1 to charge rolls for friendly GODSEEKERS units.
        Total Acquiescence Any number of SLAANESH WIZARDS in a Hedonites of Slaanesh army that have the Acquiescence spell on their warscroll can use it in the same turn, but the same WIZARD cannot attempt to cast it more than once per turn.
        Depravity Point Table Cost Ref
        (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets 12
        (02) 30 Daemonettes 12
        (03) 3 Seeker Chariots 10
        (04) 20 Daemonettes 10
        (05) 1 Contorted Epitome 9
        (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot 9
        (07) 3 Fiends 8
        (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer 8
        (09) 1 Exalted Chariot 7
        (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh 7
        (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot 7
        (12) 1 Hellflayer 7
        (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh 6
        (14) 1 Seeker Chariot 6
        (15) 5 Seekers 6
        (16) 10 Daemonettes 6

      • Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Prized Sorcery


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Prized Sorcery When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any WIZARDS from your starting army on the battlefield.
